iti41:2.1_0: “Te, bhikkhave, sattā suparihīnā ye ariyāya paññāya parihīnā.
iti41:2.2_0: Te diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhaṁ viharanti savighātaṁ saupāyāsaṁ sapariḷāhaṁ;
iti41:2.3_0: kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā duggati pāṭikaṅkhā.
iti41:2.4_0: Te, bhikkhave, sattā aparihīnā ye ariyāya paññāya aparihīnā.
iti41:2.5_0: Te diṭṭheva dhamme sukhaṁ viharanti avighātaṁ anupāyāsaṁ apariḷāhaṁ;
iti41:2.6_0: kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugati pāṭikaṅkhā”ti.
iti41:6.1_0: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti.
